analysis.description:
ARXpresale.BuyARXtokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#178-208) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,rewardTransferAmount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#199-200)

ARXpresale.withdrawRemainingTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#257-261) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,_amountToPull) (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#259-261)

Reentrancy in ARXpresale.BuyARXtokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#178-208):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,rewardTransferAmount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#199-200)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- fundValue (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#200-203)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_fundingStartBlock' of ARXpresale.Setuppresale (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#116-117) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_fundingEndBlock' of ARXpresale.Setuppresale (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#117-118) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of ARXpresale.beneficiaryMultiSigWithdraw (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#208-209) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amountToPull' of ARXpresale.withdrawRemainingTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x4ee1d7720a04072142b2efc9d2c7d5d77ad63939.sol#257) is not in mixedCase
